description:
As Kitasumi High gets serious, Nao unveils Kuzu High’s super secret defense strategy. It’s time to knock out the competition — and Sora is the key to victory!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der beste und der schlechteste Start
Le meilleur et le pire départ
Saikou no Hajimari to Saiaku no Hajimari
The Best Start and the Worst Start
最高の始まりと最悪の始まり
